title: Pleased Face
detail_text: <:th_ch0201/>Hnnn~, it’s delicious! The chocolate truffle you made tastes really good, Ruby-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It’s because Ruby we made it together through the video call, Ayumu-san. Onee-chan and the rest of everyone said that they love it too<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Fufu, I’m glad<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>How about you, Ayumu-san? You made a lot, didn’t you? Have you given them to everyone?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Yeah. I already gave them all. I especially gave a really big one to Emma-san, because she eats a lot~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ahaha, Emma-san does have a big appetite, huh<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>But seeing Emma-san’s face as she eats it is really soothing, right~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Ah, Ruby kind of gets that too. When you see the pleased face of someone dear to you, it really soothing, isn’t it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Try eating the chocolate I made too, Ruby-chan. Here, open wide<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Munch.... So good~! Ruby is melting!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Your happy face is really soothing to me too, you know, Ruby-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
